column5: [font color=green size=3][b]I just got back from Wabby, we got up there Thursday morning. The lake had a small open spot in the middle, but was mostly ice covered. The wind came up in the AM, around noon we noticed the ice had start to move, by night it was all piled up and the lake had white caps, :). The water level looked higher than last spring, but it's still a month until opener, so who knows how much rain they'll get by then.
Must be beautiful to see that. Was Perrault Falls running fast?

[font color=green size=3][b]It was about normal, but that falls north of Vermilion Bay, on the Wabigon river(If I remember right) was higher than I've seen it in a long time, it was bank full and frothy.
